Intro.title: T3Q's Dream Playverse! Anyone, Anywhere, Anything is Possible

description.m:
T3Q. is pursuing 'easy AI' and 'convenient AI' to make it easy to implement various AI services as long as you have data, based on the 'AI-Big Data Integration Platform' for processing large amounts of data and applying real-time intelligent analysis technology.
 Along with this, 'Dr.Answer 2.0,' a precision medical service for the public, and 'AI HUNMINJUNGEM,' which will become a textbook for AI, are converging with T3Q.search and marketplaces to create an AI ecosystem that creates value while enjoying and learning.
description.d:
T3Q. is pursuing 'easy AI' and 'convenient AI' to make it easy to implement various AI services as long as you have data, based on the 'AI-Big Data Integration Platform'
 for processing large amounts of data and applying real-time intelligent analysis technology.
 Along with 'Dr.Answer 2.0,' a precision medical service for the public,
 and 'AI HUNMINJUNGEM,' which will become a textbook for AI, T3Q.search, marketplace, etc. are converging to create an AI ecosystem where you can enjoy, learn, and create value for yourself.

ai-platform.d: It offers a variety of analytics engines and algorithms to improve accuracy, and can perform all processes from pre-processing to training on a screen-based basis.

bidata-platform.d: Real-time ingestion, storage, analysis, and visualization of large amounts of data, with distributed clusters to ensure scalability and reliability.

edge-intelligence.d: Ensure data protection and availability by analyzing data and performing AI functions directly in the field, rather than through a centralized system.

ai-hunmin.d: We've built 28 best practices into the T3Q.ai platform to make it easy to learn AI, easy to discover AI services, and easy to develop AI.

intelligence-smart-searching.d: Big data metadata on a variety of structured and unstructured data enables multi-keyword or similarity-based search on any data.

dr-answer.d: As a project to develop precision medical services for the public, MSIT is developing 12 diseases and 24 medical SWs based on the T3Q.ai platform.

description.m: T3Q was founded in 2007 under the value of 'reducing time by one-third and increasing quality by three times' for SW development, and has secured various technologies such as open source, architecture, big data, artificial intelligence, and deep learning, and is a group of experts who provide platforms and technologies to large companies, public institutions, and national defense.
description.d:
T3Q was founded in 2007 under the value of 'reducing time by one-third and increasing quality by three times' for SW development,
 and has secured various technologies such as open source, architecture, big data, artificial intelligence, and deep learning,
 and is a group of experts who provide platforms and technologies to large companies, public institutions, and national defense.
